articles.title: Why are sexually transmitted infections on the rise in the US? - Livescience.com
articles.description: Surging STIs are being driven by a "perfect storm" of factors in the U.S.
articles.content: Rates of sexually transmitted infections (STIs), such as syphilis, have been rising over the past few years in the U.S. But why are STI rates surging now, and what can be done to reverse that trend?… [+7832 chars]
